comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Low definition monochrome image of highly decorated and distinctively colorful Douglas F4D-1 Skyray Bu No 134802. Of “All Weather Fighter Squadron” VF(AW)-3 with tail code PA and ‘Modex’ 32 on nose. With small ‘NORAD’ badge applied behind cockpit. (North American Air Defense Command) It also carries a dark painted pod on outer wing-see notes below. A beautiful color image of the same aircraft may be viewed on ‘flickr’ here: www.flickr.com/photos/20111203@N07/2274229161/ Go here for a color profile of F4D-1 134802 as displayed in the picture above: wp.scn.ru/en/ww3/f/814/3/1/31 F4D-1 134802 was chosen for a subject by commercial model decal company “Eagle Strike” 1/72 scale set number 72-043 members.home.nl/thunderchief/modeling/pages/enf4d101.htm F4D-1 134802 was also chosen for a subject by commercial model decal company “Cutting Edge Decals” in a 1/48 scale set number CED48091 “1/48 F4D-1, 134802, PA32 of VFAW-3, Same as kit scheme, except SEPARATE YELLOW STARS! You paint the fin and spine blue and add the yellow stars. More stars on this a/c than the kit decal subject. Very attractive a/c!” There is as yet no other known internet reference to F4D-1 134802.
